English:
--------
Category: Progam 
Language: English, Spanish, German, French, Italian, Japanese, Chinese 
Included Medicine 
Operating System: Windows & MAC 

Description: 
------------ 
Perfect scores up to twice as fast, and much more ... 

Sibelius 7 is a giant step forward in the world of music notation software - with surprising innovations and improvements for educators, students, composers, arrangers, copyists and musicians of all types. 


Features 
No more arranging scores 
Only in Sibelius: Magnetic Layout is responsible for you almost every detail of the layout of the score - so easily that barely notice it. As you type, assign each item the exact amount of space and avoid collisions - for perfect results. This feature will reduce the writing time in half. 

Tracking changes and version comparison 
Only in Sibelius: Have you ever written something better in the first attempt? Versions function keeps track of revisions of the score, to help you review previous versions and see what changes were made since then. Collaboration becomes a pleasure, and you can even add sticky notes with comments to you, or others. 

Direct your scores 
It's time to take the baton! Live Tempo allows you to drive your score playing to get rich and musical interpretation. Just press a key on your computer keyboard or MIDI pedal, and Sibelius will follow your pace. 

New sounds fantastic, instantly 
The high quality playback now needs to be set - press the space bar and Sibelius will play using sampled sounds amazing. The high-quality sounds are better integrated than ever with the latest technology Digidesign AIR team. 

Synchronized with sequencers and DAWs 
Only in Sibelius: Add a live performance to an audio recording, or recording with synchronized playback of your score. You can do all this and more thanks to ReWire support, which lets you synchronize playback of Sibelius products such as Pro Tools, Cubase, Logic, GarageBand and more. 

Windows Keyboard & Fretboard 
If you prefer using a keyboard or guitar notation, these new windows are ideal. Simply press the keys or frets to enter notes and chords - or 'playing' the QWERTY keys on your computer as if it were a piano! They are also great for teaching. 

Simple chord symbols and guitar charts 
Now you can create simple tables chord symbols and guitar faster than ever from your computer keyboard, MIDI guitar or MIDI keyboard. They also have many upgrades and extra notations, such as tables of scales for guitar. 

Excellent professional scores 
Sibelius lets you produce such amazing scores, which are practically works of art. The bonds are now the most elegant and controllable from any program. You can add and drop instantly silences with bars and short stems, like arpeggio lines. Sibelius 6 even automatically include alterations of caution - which will help to produce scores ready for use at all times. 


System Requirements 

Windows: Windows XP SP2 Update Pack With The Platform or later, Windows 7 SP1 or later, 1 GB + RAM, 750 MB hard disk space, DVD-ROM drive 
Mac: Mac OS X 10.6.7 or later, Mac OS X 10.7, 1 GB + RAM, 750 MB hard disk space, DVD-ROM drive 



Recent Changes 
What's new in 7.0.1: 

This update addresses the stability, performance and includes a number of bug fixes. It is recommended for all users of Sibelius 7. The full list is quite extensive arrangements (we have fixed over 200 bugs in the update). 
Also included is an update of the library shows 7 Sibelius Sounds. Be careful to only download and run the upgrade program Sibelius Sounds 7 if you already have the complete library: If you are running the trial version of Sibelius 7, for example, it is definitely not necessary and should not install the 7 Sibelius Sounds updates.
